ygData.subject: Trained in the New Home Zone
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks for all the tips, Evulia! They are truely good advice. Unfortunately, this camp is proceeding like a bad Plane raid. My paint had really bad AC
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks for all the tips, Evulia! They are truely good advice.

Unfortunately, this camp is proceeding like a bad Plane raid. My paint had
really bad AC apparently (3 gallons for one small bedroom!), so it was not
completed before the whole zone got trained on us (3 guys and a very large
moving truck). We managed to trap a good bit of the train in the Basement
and Garage, but they will have to be cleared at some point too. I did learn
not to have a druid or a mage, even a tall one, help you paint. They got
paint all over my ceilings! My cleric was invaluable in hanging the
curtains/blinds though, he had all the reagents and did a wonderful job. I
still need to use Binding on some of the curtains (too long). The monk has
been great as well, splitting up the box spawn enough to get the small, more
delicate spawns pulled before the repop. As usual, I'm in charge of what
goes where as everyone knows bards are the ones to talk to about fashion and
organization. As a result, I can barely start on one box before the group
members present start yelling for help in another part of the zone. The
cleric has Root, he just can't seem to decide where to use it.

Our biggest problems are the spawns with the really good loot just haven't
pop'ed: the New Mattress, the Undented New Range, and the Backordered New
Furniture. Apparently, they are rare. Some of the box spawns can't be
cleared til these big guys finally pop! Hymn is becoming invaluable, as
sleeping on the floor is really hard on the hit points.

The cleric is working hard now on getting us back online at home; maybe we
will get to play again in another week!

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Excalibur, Xegony
